lyrics.text: Lesson 74. Out of the limelight. First listen and then answer the question. Why was their
lyrics.translation: 第74课。远离聚光灯。首先听录音，然后回答问题。他们为什么

lyrics.text: disguise too perfect? An ancient bus stopped by a dry river bed and a party of famous actors
lyrics.translation: 伪装太完美了吗？一辆古老的巴士停在干涸的河床边，一群著名演员下车。

lyrics.text: and actresses got off. Dressed in dark glasses and old clothes, they had taken special precautions
lyrics.translation: 女演员们下车了。她们戴着深色眼镜，穿着旧衣服，已经采取了特别的预防措施

lyrics.text: so that no one should recognize them. But as they soon discovered, disguises can sometimes be too
lyrics.translation: 所以没有人能认出他们。但是很快他们就发现，伪装有时可能太过

lyrics.text: perfect. This is a wonderful place for a picnic, said Gloria Dleen. It couldn't be better, Gloria,
lyrics.translation: 完美。这是一个野餐的好地方，格洛丽亚·德林说。再好不过了，格洛丽亚，

lyrics.text: Brinksley Mears agreed. No newspaper men, no film fans. Why don't we come more often? Meanwhile,
lyrics.translation: 布林克斯利·米尔斯同意了。没有报纸记者，也没有电影迷。我们为什么不更常来呢？与此同时，

lyrics.text: two other actors, Rockwall Slinger and Merlin Greaves, had carried two large food baskets to
lyrics.translation: 另外两位演员，洛克沃尔·斯林格和默林·格里夫斯，抬着两个大食物篮子来到

lyrics.text: a shady spot under some trees. When they had all made themselves comfortable, a stranger appeared.
lyrics.translation: 在一些树下的阴凉处。当他们都安顿下来后，一个陌生人出现了。

lyrics.text: He looked very angry. Now you get out of here, all of you, he shouted. I'm sheriff here. Do you
lyrics.translation: 他看起来非常生气。“现在你们都给我出去，”他喊道。“我是这里的警长。你们明白吗？”

lyrics.text: see that notice? It says no camping in case you can't read. Look sheriff, said Rockwall. Don't be
lyrics.translation: 看见那个通知了吗？上面写着禁止露营，以防你看不懂。看，警长，Rockwall说。别这样

lyrics.text: too hard on us. I'm Rockwall Slinger and this is Merlin Greaves. Oh is it, said the sheriff with a
lyrics.translation: 对我们太苛刻了。我是洛克沃尔·斯林格，这位是梅林·格里夫斯。哦，是吗，警长说，带着

lyrics.text: snare. Well I'm Brinksley Mears and my other name is Gloria Dleen. Now you get out of here fast.
lyrics.translation: 陷阱。我是布林克斯利·米尔斯，另一个名字叫格洛丽亚·德林。现在你快点离开这里。
